creditLine.en: M+ Sigg Collection, Hong Kong. By donation
creditLine.zh-hant: M+ 希克藏品（捐贈），香港

images.altText: Oil painting on canvas of brown and grey terrazzo; a composite flooring treatment. Tiny grey chips and pebbles, in a brown mortar, are realistically rendered in great detail.

description.en: N12 is a collective established by a group of twelve artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts in Beijing in 2003. It was formed in response to the lack of art institutions in China in the early 2000s. The group organises exhibitions with the aim of providing a platform for younger artists, even without a designated theme. Although they have a common background in painting, the group’s members are loosely connected and continue to pursue their own artistic practices. Members of N12 include Liang Yuanwei, Wang Guangle, Hu Xiaoyuan, Qiu Xiaofei, and Song Kun.
description.zh-hant: N12是一個非正式的藝術家團體，由12位來自中央美術學院的學生於2003年在北京成立。中國於二十一世紀初缺乏有系統的藝術體制，因此N12以自我組織的方式，並在沒有指定展覽主題下讓年輕一代藝術家展示創作。儘管成員均有繪畫的共同背景，但聯繫並不緊密，並進行各自的藝術實踐。N12的成員包括梁遠葦、王光樂、胡曉媛、仇曉飛和宋琨。
